name: @cothema/ngx-nlp-sdk
description: Angular SDK for natural language processing (NLP) tools.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run generate:barrels && tsc -p ./tsconfig.json
scripts.build:debug: rm -rf dist && npm run generate:barrels && tsc --sourceMap -p ./tsconfig.json
scripts.test: echo "Error: run tests from root" && exit 1
scripts.prepare: npm run generate:barrels && npm run build

author: Miloš Havlíček <havlicek@cothema.com>
